property.name: Home Site
property.value: Variag Camp, Easterling Camp, Southron Oasis

property.name: Home Site
property.value: Mt. Doom, Shelob's Lair, Goblin-gate, Moria

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Glittering Caves (0), The Pûkel-deeps (9), The Under-gates (6)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Undead - 3 strikes with 9 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold

property.name: Special
property.value: Any Undead creature or Pûkel-creature may also be played at this site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead - 1 strike with 10 prowess; each character wounded must make a corruption check

property.name: Special
property.value: During the site phase, a company may discard two minor items they bear to make any one major item (including a hoard item) playable here that turn.

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Carn Dûm (0), The Under-leas (6), The Under-vaults (7)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Trolls - 3 strikes with 9 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Ruins & Lairs

property.name: Special
property.value: If the Witch-king of Angmar is in play as a permanent-event, it must be used as an additional automatic-attack (discard after use-ignore result of defeat).

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Pûkel-men - 2 strikes with 11 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds

property.name: Special
property.value: Any Undead creature or Pûkel-creature may also be played at this site.

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Dol Guldur (0), The Under-courts (5), The Pûkel-deeps (9), The Under-gates (5), The Under-galleries (8)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Trolls - 2 strikes with 9 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds

property.name: Special
property.value: If Khamûl the Easterling or Adûnaphel is in play as a permanent-event, one must be used as an additional automatic-attack (attacker's choice, discard after use-ignore result of defeat).

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Trolls - 3 strikes with 10 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds

property.name: Special
property.value: If any Nazgûl permanent-event is in play, one must be used as an additional automatic-attack (attacker's choice, discard after use-ignore result of defeat).

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Any site in Ûdun (0), The Under-courts (4), The Sulfur-deeps (8)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Trolls - 4 strikes with 9 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds

property.name: Special
property.value: Stolen Knowledge. When Under-galleries would be placed in your discard pile, place it in your marshalling points pile instead for 3 marshalling points-this card is considered stored.

property.name: Adjacent
property.value: Moria (0), The Gem-deeps (6), The Sulfur-deeps (5), The Under-grottos (8), The Under-leas (6)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Balrog - 2 strikes with 16 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Ruins & Lairs

property.name: Special
property.value: If Balrog of Moria is in play or if it or Durin's Bane has been defeated, the first automatic attack is canceled.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Orcs - 4 strikes with 7 prowess (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold

property.name: Special
property.value: When a gold ring is tested in a company at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +2.
